options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: D

title: Why should you wear sunscreen?

options.label: D

options.label: C
options.text: Both the amount of time you spend outside and the color of your skin, as well as other factors.

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: Because you don't need to put sunscreen on all areas of the body.
